data.prompt: Write a brief, polite email to inform a customer that their order will be delayed by 2 days.
data.response:
Subject: A Quick Update on Your Order (#[Order Number])

Dear [Customer Name],

This email is to let you know that your recent order (#[Order Number]) will be delayed by two days due to [Brief, polite reason for delay, e.g., unforeseen circumstances in our warehouse].  We expect it to arrive on [New Delivery Date].

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.  You can continue to track your order here: [Tracking Link]

Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,

The [Your Company Name] Team
